1.Title: RELEASE
Content: - The game has released! Thank you for playing.

2.Title: Fishing rod & Bugfixes
Content: - Added new fishing rod ; Fish up different things from the sea!
- Added spawning of food and ammoboxes on structures.
- Lobby visual changes, teleporter improvements, new stats and changelog boards.
- Headlamps recharge every morning, added new headlamp models.

3.Title: Leaderboard & Bugfixes
Content: - Added top days leaderboard to lobby.
- Top 100 players worldwide get a special nametag!
